content: set your pet in the lap of luxury when you crochet peanut s cat couch upcycle a leftover pillow for this fun project which uses faux fur yarn to crochet a decadent pet bed this free crochet pattern includes detailed instructions for each section along with helpful tutorial images **available sizes ** one size but easily adjustable **suggested yarn ** the original sample uses wecrochet / knitpicks fable fur which is a super bulky 6 weight yarn sub in another super bulky weight yarn as needed if using a lighter-weight faux fur yarn drop your hook size **hooks used ** 8mm crochet hook **notions used ** -scissors -tapestry needle -locking stitch markers -fiber-fill
